subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Before the Mets’ loss to the Rockies, Manager Terry Collins, General Manager Sandy Alderson and pitcher Johan Santana had devised a short-term plan for Santana, who has struggled recently.
snippet: Before the Mets’ loss to the Rockies, Manager Terry Collins, General Manager Sandy Alderson and pitcher Johan Santana had devised a short-term plan for Santana, who has struggled recently.
